lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Gotye
[00:01.000] 作词 : Gotye
[00:19.000]Now and then I think of when we were together
[00:26.000]Like when you said you felt so happy you could die
[00:33.000]Told myself that you were right for me
[00:37.000]But felt so lonely in your company
[00:41.000]But that was love and it's an ache I still remember
[00:47.000]
[01:03.000]You can get addicted to a certain kind of sadness
[01:11.000]Like resignation to the end always the end
[01:18.000]So when we found that we could not make sense
[01:22.000]Well you said that we would still be friends
[01:26.000]But I'll admit that I was glad that it was over
[01:33.000]But you didn't have to cut me off
[01:37.000]Make out like it never happened
[01:39.000]And that we were nothing
[01:41.000]And I don't even need your love
[01:44.000]But you treat me like a stranger
[01:46.000]And that feels so rough
[01:48.000]No,You didn't have to stoop so low
[01:52.000]Have your friends collect your records
[01:54.000]And then change your number
[01:56.000]I guess that I don't need that though
[01:59.000]Now you're just somebody that I used to know
[02:06.000]Now you're just somebody that I used to know
[02:14.000]Now you're just somebody that I used to know
[02:18.000]
[02:33.000]Now and then I think of all the times you screwed me over
[02:40.000]But had me believing it was always something that I'd done
[02:48.000]And I don't wanna live that way
[02:52.000]Reading into every word you say
[02:55.000]You said that you could let it go
[02:58.000]And I wouldn't catch you hung up on
[03:00.000]Somebody that you used to know
[03:03.000]But you didn't have to cut me off
[03:06.000]Make out like it never happened
[03:08.000]And that we were nothing
[03:11.000]And I don't even need your love
[03:13.000]But you treat me like a stranger
[03:15.000]And that feels so rough
[03:18.000]No,you didn't have to stoop so low
[03:21.000]Have your friends collect your records
[03:23.000]And then change your number
[03:26.000]I guess that I don't need that though
[03:28.000]Now you're just somebody that I used to know
[03:32.000]somebody I used to know
tlyric:
[00:19.000]我时不时就会想起我们曾经在一起的时光
[00:26.000]那些你曾说你幸福得要升天的时光
[00:33.000]我告诉我自己你很适合我
[00:37.000]但我跟你在一起时常觉得很孤单
[00:41.000]但那就是爱，是我刻骨铭心的痛
[00:47.000]
[01:03.000]你可以沉迷于某些悲痛中
[01:11.000]就像我总是一直顺从你 直到最后一秒
[01:18.000]所以当我们发现我们在一起没意义时
[01:22.000]那么你说我们还是可以当朋友
[01:26.000]但我会承认我很庆幸这一切都已经结束了
[01:33.000]但你不需要装作不认识我
[01:37.000]你恢复的像什么都没发生过一样
[01:39.000]我们什么都不是
[01:41.000]我也根本不需要你的爱
[01:44.000]但你像个陌生人般的对待我
[01:46.000]让我很受伤
[01:48.000]不，你其实不用躲着我
[01:52.000]叫你的朋友来拿你的录音带
[01:54.000]又换了你的手机号码
[01:56.000]我想我也根本不需要去管那些事
[01:59.000]现在我们不过萍水相逢罢了
[02:06.000]现在我们不过萍水相逢罢了
[02:14.000]现在我们不过萍水相逢罢了
[02:18.000]
[02:33.000]我经常会觉得你是在耍我
[02:40.000]而且总是想让我相信这一切都是我造成的
[02:48.000]我不想再过那样的生活了
[02:52.000]每字每句都要分得清清楚楚
[02:55.000]你说你会放下一切
[02:58.000]我不想再看到你
[03:00.000]对我有任何的留恋
[03:03.000]但你不需要装作不认识我
[03:06.000]你恢复的像
[03:08.000]我们从来没发生过一样
[03:11.000]我也根本不需要你的爱
[03:13.000]但你像个陌生人般的对待我
[03:15.000]让我很受伤
[03:18.000]不，你其实不用躲着我
[03:21.000]叫你的朋友来拿你的录音带
[03:23.000]又换了你的手机号码
[03:26.000]我想我也根本不需要去管那些事
[03:28.000]现在我们不过形同陌路罢了
[03:32.000]不过是形同陌路
